component.name: createDiscussionTopic
component.description: Create an new discussion topic for the course.

component.name: listDiscussionTopics
component.description: Returns the paginated list of discussion topics for this course.

component.name: getDiscussionTopic
component.description: Returns data on an individual discussion topic.

component.name: createEntry
component.description: Create a new entry in a discussion topic.

component.name: listEntries
component.description: Retrieve a paginated list of discussion entries.
